name: CO2 Offset
description:
Create a thriving small town with the goal of earning a Million dollars. The only catch is that you have to try to stay carbon neutral. Plant trees, build clean power and biogas plants to offset your carbon production.

  • Exceed 10,000 units of carbon and you lose the game.
  • Earn 1 Million dollars and you win.

Controls

  • Move camera - WASD
  • Select/Place object - Left Mouse Button
  • Deselect object - Right Mouse Button
  • Rotate object - R
  • Zoom in/out - Scroll Wheel

Color Palette: Endesga 32 by ENDESGA #edg32
